Production Co: Le Studio Canal +, Arte France Cinema, Les Films Alain Sarde
Sound Mix: Dolby Stereo, Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Surround, Dolby SR
Synopsis: An author is working on a project about love told through three couples -- one young, one mature, one elderly. The author is working with a woman he met three years earlier while she was training as a lawyer. The woman's grandparents are approached by an American studio to make a movie about their activities during the Nazi occupation of France.
Title: In Praise of Love
